Sept. 10, 1904 D Llanelly Contest (Class B)

Gems of Sir Henry Bishop
Parc Howard, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best trombone - Brynaman. Best cornet and euphonioum - Llandilo. March contest - 1st Ystradgynlais. 4 bands competed.
